query: SELECT c.name, c.slug, COUNT(ac.articleId) as article_count FROM categories c LEFT JOIN article_categories ac ON c.id = ac.categoryId GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.slug ORDER BY article_count DESC;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user gudLYJGHFgHSL8P.e6c1a8ce02e0 --database 3FN2mXfNpKxptvfrsuACXq --execute SELECT c.name, c.slug, COUNT(ac.articleId) as article_count FROM categories c LEFT JOIN article_categories ac ON c.id = ac.categoryId GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.slug ORDER BY article_count DESC;
